page.title: 14PARENTS QUESTIONNAIRES
page.content: EMPLOYMENT POPULATION EDUCATION I did a graph to see which were the most popular pets.There were cats, dogs,budgies,guineapigs,rabbits,sheep and geese.The most popular were cats there were 20 of them next were dogs and fish and the rest came straggling behind. Next I did a graph to show how many children were most popular in a family.2 children seemed to be but 3 and 4 came close behind.Then I found out how many were boys and how many were girls,there were 36 boys and 39 girls.Next I did jobs and put them in to 5 different categories,Recreation, School,Land,Office and Helping Service.The most popular was Land with 6 people. by Sarah W.
